title: Will getting all my champs to lvl 5 increase my knowledge/my gameplay in ranked?
body:
_**Will getting all my champs to lvl 5 increase my knowledge/my gameplay in ranked?**_
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: In my opinion the same goes for any champion. The more you play it, the better you should be able to counter it. However getting mastery 5 on all champions kind of defeats this as you aren't focusing on a handful so you have a broader knowledge base with less depth (unless you are playing an obscene amount of games). To be honest, some of the best mechanical learnings I have gained have come from watching LCS games over the years. Especially listening to analysts who know in depth knowledge about specific interactions (ie. you can qss a malphite R then flash whilst still in the air to avoid extra damage from his E and autos)

Mastery 5 on every champion would be a huge waste of time. 

You really only need to play a champion once to develop a decent understanding. 

If you want to learn a champion try it out in a custom. The practice tool is awesome.

Hope this helped! :)

No, higher champion skill =/= Higher Game skill, although it will give you experience in which to apply later on in the game.

Easiest way to explain this.

I'm a silver who peaked gold (pre-perma), Currently Silv 1 on my smurf, and gold 3 on my other acc (lucky 10W provis)

Prior to my ban i had 62 champs, at masteries 6 and 7, and a further 42 at mastery 5

I've been playing since early-mid season 3. and have been bronze/silver up until now, including season 5 (400+ games) and season 6 (350+ games) last season i had just under 400 games before my ban

I can make decisions at a plat level, but have the rank of a pleb (partially my fault, i int when i get trolls to end the game faster, partially a general skill difference in teams, i had a game where there were only 15 kills, 7 on my team and 8 on the other, all shared evenly, we lost one teamfight at about 30 mins, and that was game)
i mean, level 5 mastery don't mean shit, you can just intent feed repeatedly, and still get mastery 5 on a champion.

"If you suck long and hard enough, anyone can get a Tier 10."
-Some random

Anyway, knowledge of the game, you just have to do your best, learn from your mistakes, and forget about what your team does. 

You're here to improve YOURSELF, not fix anyone else. 

Through knowledge, comes gameplay. If you know how things work, you can trash your enemy.

I don't think the others are understanding what your saying. But I'll tell you this getting level 5 on every champion can be very helpful giving you good outlooks on every champs play style and mechanics. But getting a level on a cahmp doesn't help your ranked. Your ingame knowledge and understand on what to do in certain situations and the ability to adapt to those situations is what will make you a better player.
Exactly what I meant, just wanted to know if it would help my ranked
i totally agree, you couldn't be any more right!
